üéÅ A little year-end surprise for our early collectors

If you still hold Nodle NFTs on Polkadot, you can now re-mint them on ZKsync via the Nodle Portal and keep your collection alive in Nodle‚Äôs new home.
The process is simple:

üëâ Connect to the Nodle Client at https://t.co/6h5aUipwjV
üëâ Select your Polkadot NFTs
üëâ Use one-click batch re-minting to recreate them on ZKsync as representation of your original pieces

Read the full guide here: https://t.co/L3e8W8L7Bp
As Nodle completes its move to ZKsync and sunsets Polkadot support on December 31, 2025, this is the easiest way to bring your story with us into the future.

Thank you for being part of the network, and happy holidays from the Nodle team. ‚ú®

üîª $DOT  is breaking down from a descending structure.  The failed bounce into channel resistance suggests the move was corrective, not a reversal, and momentum now leans toward continuation lower.  üìâ Technical View: ‚Ä¢ Pattern: descending channel with a downside break ‚Ä¢ Bias: bearish, as lower highs and lower lows remain intact ‚Ä¢ Key Level: the broken channel support now acts as resistance, while the next demand sits lower  ‚úÖFull analytics in telegram-> http://bit.ly/cryptolingrid    ‚ö†Ô∏è This bearish setup would be invalidated only if price quickly reclaims the channel and holds above the descending resistance, signaling a false breakdown.  #DOT  #Polkadot  #DOT price analysis#

Charles Hoskinson and Anatoly Yakovenko launch a bridge between Cardano and Solana

For a long time, the title of best ‚ÄúEthereum Killer‚Äù divided the crypto world. Cardano, $SOL, Avalanche, and Polkadot each have their vision. But in this often conflictual universe, an alliance casts doubt: what if the future belongs to those who cooperate? Hoskinson (Cardano) and Yakovenko (Solana) have decided to extend a hand. The ego war gives way to a bridge. Literally. The unexpected rapprochement could upset the balances.

$DOT I have bad news and good news, first I'll give you the good news. WARNING: Btc is about to close below EMA 10&20 on 4H timeframe(88k) which is crucial support here, currently it's 87k , 15 minutes left to close on 4H timeframe and if it closes below 88k which is most likely to happen, next target is 100% 85500$(the bottom of Keltner Channel on 4H timeframe and if selling pressure persists, it might close below 85k today and if it closes below 85k according to the Options expiry which is the largest in history of all crypto(Today=Friday), then prepare freefall to 80k and more selling pressure means more downside movement and 75k(bottom of the Bolinger Band) and with dominance showing strength(currently above EMA 10 on 1W timeframe, 62% is not out of the realm of possibilities. (62%=top of KC on 1W timeframe) and with Btc going down plus the dominance going up expect blood bath in altcoins and I personally believe we might see Polkadot close at 1.5$ before Dec ends. Polkadot is currently below Keltner Channel on 1W timeframe. If Dot closed below 1.8$ this week, then the first two weeks of Jan will be blood for Polkadot BUT on the other hands, the great news is last time Polkadot touched the bottom of KC on 1W timeframe was 9th October 2023 on Mon which sent the price from 3.5$ to 12$ and it happened before that which was in the bear market 2022 on 26th Dec 2022 on monday and even though it was the bear market and worst time of the market but still it sent the price from 4.25$ to 7.9$. It's happening for the third time now ladies and gentlemen since 2022, DOT/USDC is currently below KC on 1W timeframe while it so close to the bottom(1.63$) against USDT and this indicates a very strong movement we will have in Jan soon.
